item.title: Apache OpenWhisk Web Action HTTP Proxy
item.description: What if you could take an existing web application and run it on a serverless platform with no changes? ðŸ¤” Lots of existing (simple) stateless web applications are perfect candidates for serverless, but use web frameworks that don’t know how to integrate with those platforms. People have started to develop a number of custom plugins for those frameworks to try and bridge this gap. These plugins can provide an easier learning curve for developers new to serverless.
